original_title: The Gospel According to Booze, Bullets & Hot Pink Jesus, Act III: Have Faith, Will Travel
overview: A gringo whose cozy little job with the Mexican mob went awry, a failed actor and dejected athlete living in the past, a stripping diva with criminal delusions of grandeur, and a prodigal son with something to prove. Unbeknownst to them, they're all after the same get-rich-quick fix.
title: The Gospel According to Booze, Bullets & Hot Pink Jesus, Act III: Have Faith, Will Travel
